text: once upon a time there was a Toby who
had a thin donkey he was very poor so he
could not feed the donkey properly and
sufficiently but the loads of dirty
clothes were increasing one day the
donkey complained to the master master I
am NOT able to carry so much load the
food you give me is not sufficient why
don't you do something to ease my
difficulty you are an animal with five
senses you are my slave I am your master
you have no right to complain about your
difficulties do what I say even though
the washerman was harsh with the donkey
he took pity on the donkey he could see
the donkey suffering what to do he was
thinking like this and was walking down
when he saw a dead tiger he thought of
an idea
[Music]
he covered the donkey with the tiger
skin then the donkey looked like a tiger
hey donkey you have been asking me for a
favor for a very long time I don't
understand what you say master you can't
understand anything go to the nearest
wheat field eat to your heart's content
master your suggestion is good suppose
something happens to me danger is
everywhere
you can't live if you are afraid of
everything he convinced the donkey and
sent him the donkey a domed the tiger
skin and emptied the paddy field many
days passed by the farmers who owned the
fields were scared of the tiger and
didn't know what to do but some of them
decided to catch it however one day as
usual the donkey in the form of Tiger
came somewhere another donkey was brain
this donkey forgot the tiger role he was
playing a
started to bring others found out that
it was a donkey and not tiger they came
running the teams and clubs and bet the
donkey to death at night with the donkey
didn't return home the dhobi went in
search of the donkey he saw the dead
donkey and realized what had happened he
thought if he claimed that as his donkey
he would get the same treatment and
quietly went back modern perfect nature
never changes however one tries to keep
other birth in future vgv it's true
colour
